1.content:
The sky was beggining to darken as Gavin made his way to his tent.
He had just left his base to get away from the many duties he had on his shoulders.
He always had been the outdoors kind of person. Yet the night seemed diffrent from the rest he had experienced, there was a strange darkness in the stars that made him feel very uneasy. "I do sure know how to pick the days I go camping" he thought to himself. He made his way over to his tent and took his gray belt jacket off. He then tossed it in the small 2 person tent. The inside of his tent was orange with black corners and white stripes coming from to top down the sides. "Damn...so tired" he said to himself. He crawled over to his sleeping bag and quickly dose off. He was unaware of how much his life was going to change forever.
1.title: Beginnings

choices: Stay with Krystal and accept his fate?
Try to find a way to save her?
11.content: "Launch the pod!" yelled Fox as he stared at the dark swirling mass sucked all of the sorrounding debri into its center. "No Fox! Don't do it! There's another way!" yelled Krystal inside the small blue pod. "No there's no other way." he said to her trying to sound as calm as he could to her. "No please! I want to be with you, I don't want to be without you!" she said beating on the glass casing of the pod, as tears strened down her face, matting her blue fur. "Slippy do it! Launch the pod now! Before we get closer to the black hole!" Fox said to the frightened little frog. "We can't Fox! The Arwings are draining the Great Fox's reactors. They are draining them due to extensive damage they took when we last fought Wolf and his team." said Slippy to Fox who was down in the Pod Launch Bay. "Fox the only way she will make it out is if we jettison them into space. It's up to you, Fox." said Slippy in the most serious way Fox had never heard from his longtime friend. Fox just felt hopeless hearing the only option he had. What should he do?
11.title: Into Deep Space

choices: Hope you will see Fox someday again?
111.content: "Fox it's time to make a choice!" said Slippy. Fox's head was innundated with thought, decisions he should make but was scared he would pick the wrong one. He finally knew what he needed to do. "Jetison all the arwings." he said expression less. "No Fox! Please don't do it!" Krystal yelled in tears. "I'm so sorry" is al he said. He then turned around and started to walk away. "Fox please stop it! Please! Don't leave me alone!" she said, crying. Mist started to fill the inside of the pod. She knew what it was, sleeping gas. She watched thru the pods glass window as it was being jetisoned. The pod was then half full of gas. She looked and saw the Great Fox one more time. She saw it hurl towards the spiral. She was overcome with great sadness and then she knew she was alone. The gas started to take effect as she fell asleep seconds prior to seeing the Great Fox be destroyed. Krystal was asleep but with her extrodinary powers was still awake in her thoughts. "What can I do now?" she asked herself before subcoming to the full effect of the sleep gas that now caused her body to relax and enter a deep sleep. Not even her powers were match for the sleeping gas.
111.title: Release the Arwings?

choices: Meet Gavin and let him help Krystal?
Krystal loses it and eventually dies?
1112.content: Krystal dreamed all thru her flight as the pod hurled towards Sullence, a planet under a global war against The Mecha. Krystal eventually accepte Fox's death, but the more she thought of him, the more the memories, the moments she lived with him seemed to become harder and harder to get ahold of. She began to question where she was. Where she was headed. Who she was. "why am I here" she wondered as she walked in her dream land that she was lost in. She just walked and walked but never seemed to get anywhere. She soon lost her grip on her mind and drifted into a lost state of mind. Still as she slept.
1112.title: Accept Fox's death.

11122.content:
Krystal drifted across endless times and realitys in her mind. She tryed to clear her thoughts but it was inevitable. She lost all of touch with reality and died of confusion and sadness.
Her pod was eventually found drifting across space and was recovered by Cornerian Protection Military Corps. She was identified and was buried in her teams memorial grave markers. Their bodies were never recovered.



Wooh! This was a rather depressing chapter! I really want to avoid death scenes! I'm no good at these.
(unless there's action involved). Her team was buried in the Cornerian Capitol next to Fox McCloud. The team had been given a memorial fir their brave actions to save the Lylat System. Wanna find out how this happened? Keep reading and then maybe you'll find out. Till next time.....I'll see ya around fellow readers!
This has been your host Vrance Movado saying farewell!
11122.title: Krystal loses it and eventually dies?

11123.content:
Krystal drifted across endless times and realitys in her mind. She tryed to clear her thoughts but it was inevitable. She lost all of touch with reality and died of confusion and sadness.
Her pod was eventually found drifting across space and was recovered by Cornerian Protection Military Corps. She was identified and was buried in her teams memorial grave markers. Their bodies were never recovered.



Wooh! This was a rather depressing chapter! I really want to avoid death scenes! I'm no good at these.
(unless there's action involved). Her team was buried in the Cornerian Capitol next to Fox McCloud. The team had been given a memorial fir their brave actions to save the Lylat System. Wanna find out how this happened? Keep reading and then maybe you'll find out. Till next time.....I'll see ya around fellow readers!
This has been your host Vrance Movado saying farewell!
11123.title: The end of the road.

choices: Do nothing and hold Krystal for the last time?
A mysterious Savior helps the team.
112.content: He regret having put Krystal in the pod, he felt that there was no way he could leave Krystal alone in a world all alone. So he told Slippy to open the pod. The glass casing slowly lifted up to let Krystal out who only wanted to be with him. "Fox, thank you! I know you wouldn't do it" she said throwing himself in his arms. Fox caught her in his arms and embraced her very tightly. " Krystal I'm so sorry I this ever came across my mind. I'm so sorry" he said looking in her beautiful green eyes. "Fox I love you" she said to him as she gave him a kiss that caught Fox offguard. The kiss eventually became mutual and then Fox brocke the silence. "i've always lived you but I've never had the courage to tell you" he said looking at her. "Well I wish you would have told me earlyer Fox, we would have had much more time" she said. Fox hugged her and then walked over towards the viewing platform. They both stared at the darkness and then Fox said " Better late than never" he said. The ship hurled towards the hole and strted to shake the entire ship violently. "Only a miracle can save us" said Krystal.
112.title: Stay with Krystal and accept his fate?

1121.content:
The Great Fox hurled towards the black hole, being violently torn apart. Fox hugged Krystal tighter than he ever had. Then there was nothing left. All had been lost. The Lylat System was doomed.


Ha ha this ended kinda soon, don't ya think? Ha try going back and picking a new route. This has been your host -Vrance Movado


Questions? Comments? Send me an email at. vrance@live.com
1121.title: Do nothing and hold Krystal for the last time?

1122.content:
"Fox! You have to look at this!" yelled Slippy to Fox in his intercom. " What is it Slippy?" asked Fox curious. "You are not gonna believe this Fox!" said Falco satrring out the glass of the main flight room.
"Damn it! What is it!?" said Fox inpaciently. Krystal suddenly said to Fox "Fox I can feel the presence of someone coming from the center of the black hole." she said confused. Fox then ran to the navigation room and stared at an object in the distance. Everyone stared in disbelief as the figure closed his hands and put them infront of "its" body. "What in the world is it doing?!" asked Falco. "Look! The hole.... It's closing!" said Slippy wild eyed. "How is that possible!?" asked Falco. The figure then closed completely the hole and turned towards the ship. "Its coming this way!" said Slippy.
1122.title: A mysterious Savior helps the team.

11221.content:
"Lets get out of here! I'm not messing with anything that powerful!" said Falco. That being said Fox started the engines and left at full speed.



Who knows who that person was. Maybe you'll find out in another ending, till then..., try again.
11221.title: Run?

113.content:
He ran up and down the ships computers trying to find any window
of opportunity he coul find. But no it was useless. There was nothing he could do other than be with Krystal the last moments of his life and hers. He opened the pod and told her all he felt for her and embraced her."Good bye Lylat" said Fox. The Great Fox then suddenly began to shake violently. The gravity inside the black hole was to much the ship could take, causing it to implode. All that was, was never to be seen again. As it never existed.
113.title: Try to find a way to save her?

info.brief_description: You are a leader of a resistance in the planet Sullence. you then meet the StarFox team.
info.description: This is you, a famous resistance leader who meets Krystal in the most unusuall way. Keep the story within the limits, uhh don't go way off. Try to keep it resonable. Other than that enjoy. - Vrance Movado P.S. If you have any questions email me at Vrance@live.com
